item.title: Tekton Triggers CEL
item.description: Use CEL interceptors in Tekton Triggers to transform git references and automate webhook-based pipeline execution.

item.title: Github Actions test a full Tekton CI installation
item.description: Build a fully tested Tekton CI installation using GitHub Actions, K3d, and Flux for reliable cloud-native CI/CD pipelines.
